name: func. Temp
func. RH
Description
info:
Receive BME readings via MQTT protocol
Temperature, pressure and Rel. Humidity.
For each variable:
- Display value in a gaugge.
- Record a chart trend.
- Send to Influx Data Base.
- Send to the Debug console.

name: Description
info:
Thermostat:
Get flow variable Temp and compare with 
setpoint. Switch heater ON/OFF.
Deadband is adjustable.

GPIO Controls:
Switches to control ESP digital outputs.
Signals sent via MQTT protocol to ESP device.
The topic is: esp/digital/xx
"xx" is the GPIO number
The ESP will identify this number.

name: func. Press
func. thermostat

Get GPIO Fdback
